Package noteApp.model.savestate

Interface SaveState

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractState, OfflineState, OnlineState
    public interface SaveState
    Interface for different state objects in the application. State's required functionalities are defined here.
    Author:
    Matias Vainio

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void createNote​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String content)
      Creates a new note which has specified title and content.
      void getNotesFromDisk​(Filehandler filehandler, MainLayoutController mlc)
      Retrieves notes which are saved on the local machine.
      void handleDelete()
      Removes a note from list in view.
      void handleNote()
      Updates note which is then saved based on the state which is currently in use.
      void setArchiveList()
      Sets archived notes to the list in view.
      void setList()
      Updates the view with updated list of notes.

    • Method Detail

      • createNote

        void createNote​(java.lang.String title,
                java.lang.String content)
        Creates a new note which has specified title and content.
        Parameters:
        title - title to be added to the note.
        content - content to be added to the note.

      • setList

        void setList()
        Updates the view with updated list of notes.

      • setArchiveList

        void setArchiveList()
        Sets archived notes to the list in view.

      • handleNote

        void handleNote()
        Updates note which is then saved based on the state which is currently in use.

      • handleDelete

        void handleDelete()
        Removes a note from list in view. If application is in online state the note is removed from the database also.

      • getNotesFromDisk

        void getNotesFromDisk​(Filehandler filehandler,
                      MainLayoutController mlc)
        Retrieves notes which are saved on the local machine.
        Parameters:
        filehandler - reference to Filehandler used to read the files.
        mlc - reference to the MainLayoutController.
